title: Even A Tired Villain Has Circumstances - Novel Updates

description:
Baek Woo-jin, the older brother of the protagonist and the villain of the game.

The day he saw the ending of his hundredth death, a notification arrived.

[Baek Woojin died 100 times. A hidden event will occur! Would you like to accept it?]
The game that charges for everything is showing you a free of charge event,

You should have been suspicious.

But the foolish man pressed the s*upid word, “yes”

And possessed Baek Woo-jin, the villain who died a hundred times.

And he received a quest as soon as he possessed,

Reconcile with Baek So-hyuk, the younger brother who killed Baek Woo-jin!

But what? If you fail, the penalty is death?

To pull out this crazy flag of death,

He hastened and put the apology in his mouth, but…….

[Status Abnormality Triggered: The remark is corrected and delivered to the other party due to ‘entitlement’.]
“If you kneel down and beg, there’s nothing you can’t live with.”

The only thing that comes out of his mouth is venomous words, so misunderstanding with Baek So-hyuk keeps piling up.

To make matters worse, he even drags the main villain, Kang Kwon-hoo’s aggro.

“What you’re doing is pretty funny, so I’ll do as you say.”

Is this what it feels like to have a shrimp in a whale fight?

Please, both of you stop paying attention to me,

I just want to have a carefree life!>
